items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bridal dress
items.body: This dress was perfect for my fall engagement shoot! So comfortable and flattering. I would say it’s true to size, if I had wanted it more fitted I could have sized down. Stretchy material but not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Lindsay S

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and trendy
items.body: This dress is beautiful. The model in the photo has very tan skin, so I was concerned on how it would look with my very pale skin. But it actually worked out very well! I would say this dress is true to size, and is very comfortable. It is semi loose in the middle, but overall is fitted. I typically do not wear are very fitted clothing, and this was all right for me. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big booty gals rethink it
items.body: This dress was amazing quality and true to size. It fit me beautifully. The only issue is, I have a BIG booty and it was just too short :( so I returned it Read more
items.author: Reilly Shine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got so many compliments on this dress!
items.body: Love everything about this dress! It’s a nice lightweight soft fabric, sheer outer later and sheer arms. The fit is perfect and is very flattering. No odd smells. Has a good amount of stretch. Took it out of the package and hung it up, and wrinkles it may have had came out right away. I have not tried to wash it yet so can’t speak to that. But love the overall quality! I’m 5’2”, 145-150lbs, 36c and a medium fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: ProudMommyOf4Boys

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks cheap
items.body: Runs small looks cheap Read more
items.author: Lpatterson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t love it on
items.body: I didn’t really notice the pattern is hearts. Usual size XL fit too baggy, not tapered at the waist as pictured. Looks more boxy. Sleeves are really long and bell shape Read more
items.author: momof threeboys

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very nice dress!
items.body: The perfect little black dress. I wore it to a wedding and got many compliments! I am Only 5’1” so the length was perfect. Washes great and would be a good to pack for travel as it doesn’t wrinkle. Read more
items.author: Barb Wenham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Got so many compliments. Material is stretchy and very comfortable. Arms are sheer but still stayed warm for an outdoor fall wedding. Read more
items.author: Lindsay G

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Floral Black, Floral Wine Red, Pink, Floral White, Floral Light Blue, Floral Black Red, Dusty Pink, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
